workout_groups.name: Visualization
workout_groups.description: Improve mental imagery skills to enhance performance, decision-making, and goal-setting.

workouts.name: Success Visualization
workouts.description: Mentally rehearse yourself successfully achieving a goal or performing a task.

workouts.name: Mental Walkthrough
workouts.description: Imagine yourself going through a complex scenario step by step with precision.

workouts.name: Speed Visualization Drill
workouts.description: Quickly visualize a scenario and make rapid mental adjustments to reactions.

workouts.name: Sensory Amplification
workouts.description: Visualize with extreme detail—sounds, textures, emotions—to enhance memory and performance.

workouts.name: Future Self Projection
workouts.description: Visualize and embody the best version of yourself in full detail.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Visualization Training
workout_groups.description: Train the mind to create hyper-detailed mental images that enhance cognitive function and performance.

workouts.name: Multisensory Visualization
workouts.description: Visualize a scenario while engaging all five senses in full detail.

workouts.name: 4D Mental Projection
workouts.description: Visualize an environment from multiple perspectives (top-down, side view, first-person).

workouts.name: High-Speed Mental Simulation
workouts.description: Rapidly run through multiple scenarios in sequence, training for split-second adaptability.

workouts.name: Precision Mental Rehearsal
workouts.description: Perform complex tasks in your mind with exact precision and timing before executing them in reality.

workout_groups.name: Psi Visualization Techniques
workout_groups.description: Project thoughtforms, generate hyper-realistic mental imagery, and explore dimensional overlays.

workouts.name: Projected Astral Sight
workouts.description: Extend visualization beyond the physical body, seeing in multi-layered energetic overlays.

workouts.name: Tesseract Perception Training
workouts.description: Visualize and manipulate fourth-dimensional structures, breaking traditional spatial limitations.

workouts.name: Psi-Symbol Encoding
workouts.description: Imprint mental symbols into your consciousness for advanced subconscious programming.

workouts.name: Dimensional Layer Synchronization
workouts.description: Align your consciousness with multiple dimensional overlays, creating an expanded perception matrix.
